body.name: MICHELANGELO 12 Inch Frying Pan Nonstick, Nonstick Frying Pan with Lid 12 Inch, Large Frying Pan with Soft Grip Handle, 12 Inch Nonstick Skillet Pan with Stone Coating, Blue
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 4 mins
features: ECO-FRIENDLY STONE NONSTICK COATING: The 12inch nonstick frying pan with lid is made with stone derived nonstick coating，which is ultra non stick and durable. Food just slides right off the truly nonstick surface for perfect cooking. Vibrant blue enamel on the outside of the large nonstick skillet adds a pop of color to your kitchen.

HEATS QUICKLY & EVENLY: This nonstick large frying pan is made of professional grade aluminum alloy provides excellent heat conduction and warp-resistance, releasing foods effortlessly. You can also use the best nonstick frying pan to cook a sausages, beef, seafood, poultry, burgers or vegetables.

ERGONOMIC SOFT GRIP'S HANDLE & TEMPERED GLASS LID: The 12inch skillet pan with lid has suitable handle lengths, and curved radians which is designed to suitable for grasping and staying cooling while cooking. The glass lid to match this 12inch non stick frying pan retains heat and locks in moisture, allows you check the food while it cooks.

SAFE & EASY TO CLEAN: This large skillet pan nonstick is durable while remaining 100% free of PFOA, PTFA, lead, and cadmium, ideal for greener and healthy cooking. Dishwasher safe, hand wash recommended.

VERSATILE PERFORMANCE: The stone nonstick frying pan 12 inch suitable for all stovetops except induction. It is delivers ultimate food release, ideal for use on low to medium heat with less oil. Oven safe to 330°F.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 12 Inch Nonstick Frying Pan with Lid for Everyday Cooking Stone-derived nonstick coating is ultra non-stick and durable.Ideal for preparing eggs, omelets, vegetables and sauces.Designed for everyday use and offers fast and even heating.Comes with glass lid for easy viewing and locks in moisture.

GRANITE COATING The nonstick 12" frying pan infused with stone effortless food release and lightweight for an easy and comfortable cooking. EASY TO CLEAN This nonstick frying skillet provided with the non-stick stone coating, you would just need to wipe the surface easily clean with a cloth. HEATS QUICKLY & EVENLY The 12inch nonstick frying pan with lid have 3 layers durable bottom which provides superior heat transfer and warp-resistance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality frying pan
reviews.reviewText: This frying pan definitely fulfills all the requirements I was looking for in a frying pan. The size is well suited to most of my frying needs, not too heavy or shallow. The "non-stick" feature was the number one reason I purchased this item. My previous main frying pan had lived a long life and was scratched up and everything was sticking.This pan is absolutely non-stick! While it is still "new", I've used it about 6 times at the time of this writing. It has surpassed my expectations at how easy it is to clean and how nothing sticks. I use a silicone spatula when cooking in this pan.The care instructions do state that the pan is dishwasher safe, but I personally do not put pots and pans in the dishwasher. Lids, yes, but not the pans themselves. Non-stick pans are so quick and easy to clean, I prefer to just use a non-scratch scrubber with dish soap and hot water in the sink.The lid fits perfectly and has a handle that is easy to grasp and does not get so hot that you need a mitt to pick it up with. The lid is glass so you can see what you are cooking without lifting it up and is fully dishwasher safe.The "soft grip handle" of the pan itself is a very comfortable size and easy to grip while maneuvering a full pan of food on a hot stove. The pan handle does not heat up, nor is it slippery.The pan was packed well and arrived in perfect condition on the exact date indicated when I ordered it.I would certainly recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a quality non-stick frying pan at a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well. Very Pleased.
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this pan is as advertised. First of all, it is attractive and well constructed. Food cooks evenly and doesn't stick. Also this pan is very easy to clean, in large part due to how well the non-stick surface works. I love my new 12' fry pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best pan we have
reviews.reviewText: Nothing sticks and heat distribution is great. Easy to clean and has withstood daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good frying pan
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical about buying from this brand, as I had never heard of it, but I saw that it had three layer construction, a reasonable price, and great reviews, so I figured I'd give it a try. I've used it a few times now and it is obviously higher quality than the previous T-Fal frying pan that I had. Looking at them side-by-side, this one is noticeably thicker. The non-stick function on this one is also better than I ever have experienced with any other pan. I expect to get a few years out of this pan at least and will be sure to update this review whenever it gives out. If you don't see an update, assume it is still going strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s a nice pan. I needed to keep stove clean, it does
reviews.reviewText: I have no idea how long it will hold up, I am getting ready to move and the packers put all my pots and pans in unmarked boxes… I needed to get something usable that would minimize mess on my stove. This does a nice job. It’s also extremely slick inside. They are serious about nonstick. It cleans up well also. I’d recommend it.
